alert.note: Alert for Darke; Mercer (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 6:47PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SHOWER WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL DARKE AND SOUTHWESTERN MERCER COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 646 PM EDT, a shower was located near St. Henry, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Henry, Burkettsville, North Star, New Weston, Eldora Speedway, and Rose Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. Residents in these areas should remain alert. If this shower becomes stronger, then a warning may be needed. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
